languages.text: "Здесь — да. Но есть другое место, где они имеют право на существование. Где ничего плюс ничего могут равняться чему-то. Где математический ноль может умереть и разложиться, а бесконечность — исчислить сама себя".

"They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."
languages.original_text: "Здесь — да. Но есть другое место, где они имеют право на существование. Где ничего плюс ничего могут равняться чему-то. Где математический ноль может умереть и разложиться, а бесконечность — исчислить сама себя".

traits.locale_text: "They do and they are — here. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay and infinity can measure itself."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

traits.locale_text: "They do and they are — here. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay and infinity can measure itself."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

traits.locale_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: 「彼らはそうするし、彼らはいる―この場所に。しかし他にも彼らが存在する権利がある場所がある。何もないところと何もないところが積み重なって、何かになる。数学的ゼロが消滅し崩壊し、無限がそれ自体を計測する場所だ」
languages.original_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはそうするし、彼らはいる―この場所に。しかし他にも彼らが存在する権利がある場所がある。何もないところと何もないところが積み重なって、何かになる。数学的ゼロが消滅し崩壊し、無限がそれ自体を計測する場所だ」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “确实到处都是错误，但只有在这里才是错误。到了另一个地方，这所有的一切都有了意义。在那里，零和零相加的结果不再是零，数学意义上的零会在现实意义上消亡、腐朽，而无限本身可以测量。”
languages.original_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."

traits.locale_text: “确实到处都是错误，但只有在这里才是错误。到了另一个地方，这所有的一切都有了意义。在那里，零和零相加的结果不再是零，数学意义上的零会在现实意义上消亡、腐朽，而无限本身可以测量。”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Beides stimmt – hier. Aber es gibt einen anderen Ort, wo sie das Recht haben, zu existieren. Wo nichts zu nichts addiert werden kann und etwas ergibt. Wo die mathematische Null verschwinden und verrotten kann, und wo die Unendlichkeit sich selbst messen kann."
languages.original_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."

traits.locale_text: "Beides stimmt – hier. Aber es gibt einen anderen Ort, wo sie das Recht haben, zu existieren. Wo nichts zu nichts addiert werden kann und etwas ergibt. Wo die mathematische Null verschwinden und verrotten kann, und wo die Unendlichkeit sich selbst messen kann."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « C'est vrai... du moins en ces lieux. Mais il existe un autre endroit où ils ont le droit d'exister. Un endroit où rien plus rien peuvent se cumuler pour devenir quelque chose. Où le zéro mathématique disparaît et où l'infini peut se mesurer à lui seul. »
languages.original_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai... du moins en ces lieux. Mais il existe un autre endroit où ils ont le droit d'exister. Un endroit où rien plus rien peuvent cumuler pour devenir quelque chose. Où le zéro mathématique disparaît et où l'infini peut se mesurer à lui seul. »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «Eso es cierto, sí... en este lugar. Pero existe otro lugar donde sí tienen razón de ser. Donde nada y nada pueden sumarse para ser algo. Donde el cero matemático puede perecer y descomponerse, y lo infinito puede medirse a sí mismo».
languages.original_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es cierto, sí... aquí. Pero existe otro lugar donde sí tienen razón de ser. Donde nada y nada pueden sumarse para ser algo. Donde el cero matemático puede perecer y descomponerse, y lo infinito puede medirse a sí mismo».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Burada öyleler. Başka bir yerde ise var olma hakkına sahipler. Hiçbir şeyin hiçbir şeyle toplanıp bir şey meydana getirebileceği yerde. Matematiksel sıfırın yok olup çürüyebileceği, sonsuzluğun ise kendi başına ölçümlenebileceği yerde."
languages.original_text: "They do, and they are — in this place. But there is another place where they have the right to exist. Where nothing and nothing can add up to become something. Where the mathematical zero can perish and decay, and infinity can measure itself."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleler. Burada. Başka bir yerde ise var olma hakkına sahipler. Hiçbir şeyin hiçbir şeyle toplanabileceği ve bir şey olabileceği yerde. Matematiksel sıfırın yok olabileceği ve çürüyebileceği, sonsuzluğun ise kendi başına ölçümlenebileceği yerde."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
